forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. High 8C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. High 47F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low near 40F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 2C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 35F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
